channel.title: edited with chatgpt on
channel.description: Recent content in edited with chatgpt on

item.title: Team Performance
item.description: Introduction This case study aims to investigate the challenges faced by a low-performing team in the freelancing industry and the strategies employed to improve team performance.

item.title: Team Performance 2
item.description: Introduction The development of an ERP interface is a complex task, requiring significant resources and time. The ERP Interface Team, consisting of six engineers, was tasked with building a new ERP interface for the company’s product.

item.title: Team Retention
item.description: Introduction Acquisitions are a common occurrence in the business world and can lead to significant changes for employees, including uncertainty, and stress.

item.title: Team Retention 2
item.description: Introduction This study aims to examine the factors that contributed to the retention of one team at a company that operates in the circular economy space, focusing on workplace assets.
